programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A college undergraduate training for a marathon is drawn into a shady world of espionage by his secret agent brother and a Nazi war criminal searching for a cache of stolen diamonds - entangling the student in a plot involving kidnap, torture and political intrigue. John Schlesinger's thriller, starring Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier and Roy Scheider. Based on the novel by William Goldman(n).(n)

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: A hard-boiled cavalry scout with a feral dog as companion stumbles across a woman and her child stranded on their homestead deep inside hostile territory. Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate(n).(n)

programme.title: Who's That Knocking at My Door
programme.desc: Harvey Keitel plays a tough Italian-American who prefers hanging out with a rough and ready street gang to spending time with his increasingly frustrated girlfriend. Urban crime story, with Zina Bethune and Anne Colette(n).(n)

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell(n).(n)

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A charming psychopath meets a tennis professional on a train and suggests that they each commit a murder on the other's behalf. However, when the deranged man goes through with his part of the deal, the sportsman faces a race against time to prove his innocence. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on the novel by Patricia Highsmith, starring Robert Walker, Farley Granger and Ruth Roman(n).(n)

programme.title: Appaloosa

However, the pair find their friendship threatened by the arrival of attractive widow Allison, who leads Virgil to question his nomadic existence. Western, starring Ed Harris, Viggo Mortensen, Jeremy Irons and Renee Zellweger(n).(n)

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora

Starring Martin Balsam, So Yamamura, Joseph Cotten, James Whitmore and Jason Robards(n).(n)

programme.title: Tangerines
programme.desc: In the Apkhazeti region of Georgia in 1990, an Estonian man has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines, but when a wounded man is left behind, he is forced to take him in. Drama, starring Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze and Elmo Nuganen. In Estonian, Russian and Georgian(n).(n)

programme.desc: A couple and their young son move to another city, and find themselves feeling adrift in a strange place. Black comedy, starring Adam Scott, Taylor Schilling and Jason Schwartzman(n).(n)

Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss(n).(n)

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: A woman disappears without trace on her fifth wedding anniversary. Her husband contacts the police, but struggles to cope as his marriage is scrutinised by the media. As his behaviour grows stranger and more evasive, he finds himself accused of her murder. David Fincher's crime thriller based on Gillian Flynn's novel, starring Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike and Neil Patrick Harris(n).(n)

Drama, directed by and starring Dennis Hopper, with Peter Fonda, Jack Nicholson and Phil Spector(n).(n)

Featuring contributions from friends and family, including fellow directors Steven Spielberg, Francis Ford Coppola, Martin Scorsese, Oliver Stone, Michael Mann and Clint Eastwood(n).

programme.title: Night Passage
programme.desc: The black sheep of a family falls in with a gang of outlaws plotting to rob a train operated by his strait-laced brother, but reckons without his sibling's determination to track him down and set him back on the straight and narrow. Western, starring James Stewart, Audie Murphy, Dan Duryea and Brandon de Wilde(n).

Supernatural romantic comedy, starring James Stewart, Kim Novak, Jack Lemmon, Ernie Kovacs and Elsa Lanchester(n).

Comedy, with Rachel McAdams, Harrison Ford and Diane Keaton(n).

Comedy drama, starring Judi Dench, Bill Nighy, Maggie Smith and Dev Patel(n).

The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore, Steve Buscemi, David Huddleston, Philip Seymour Hoffman and John Turturro(n).

Drama, directed by Gus Van Sant and starring Matt Damon and Casey Affleck(n).(n)

Western, with Randolph Scott, Angela Lansbury, Jean Parker and Warner Anderson(n).(n)

Western, starring Audie Murphy, Michael Burns, Laraine Stephens, Kenneth Tobey and Michael Keep(n).(n)

Drama, starring Alec Guinness, Dirk Bogarde and Anthony Quayle(n).(n)

programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: A traumatised former prisoner of war gets married, but continues to suffer nightmares about his experiences. Fact-based drama, starring Colin Firth, Nicole Kidman and Stellan Skarsgard(n).(n)

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: A hard-drinking San Francisco cop investigates the case of a man murdered with an ice-pick, but his normally well-honed intuition starts letting him down as he falls for the sultry and manipulative chief suspect, the victim's former girlfriend. Thriller from director Paul Verhoeven, starring Sharon Stone, Michael Douglas, George Dzundza and Jeanne Tripplehorn(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An old army friend of John's visits and causes havoc among the Waltons by starting a fire and accidentally shooting their dog(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob ends up in hospital with appendicitis, forcing Grandpa and John-Boy to rely on a famous author to help them complete an important contract(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: When the Ingalls girls go swimming, their friend Ellen Taylor gets trapped underwater and drowns, and her grief-stricken mother begins to imagine that Laura is Ellen(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary mistakenly jumps to the conclusion that her mother has fallen for Chris, the handsome handyman they have hired to finish work on the house(n).

programme.title: Miles to Go

Drama, starring Jill Clayburgh and Tom Skerritt(n).

programme.title: A Family in Crisis: The Elian Gonzales Story
programme.desc: A five-year-old Cuban refugee is rescued from a disaster at sea and taken to America - where he finds himself a political pawn as relatives and two national governments haggle over his future in a headline-grabbing case. Fact-based drama, starring Esai Morales, Alec Roberts and Alan Rachins(n).

programme.title: Taming Andrew

programme.title: Telling Secrets
programme.desc: Part two of two. A woman is shocked to learn of her husband's infidelity, and her reaction leaves a lot to be desired as she vows to hunt down the other woman and kill her. Drama, starring Cybill Shepherd, Ken Olin and Christopher McDonald(n).

programme.desc: A woman becomes convinced her smooth-talking ex-husband is responsible for the death of his latest wife, and persuades a detective to help prove her hunch. Mystery thriller, starring Harry Hamlin, Helen Shaver, KT Oslin and Terence Knox(n).

programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a new convict in a women's prison, who struggles to expose a corrupt system under which guards demand sexual favours from her fellow inmates. Stephanie Zimbalist, Finola Hughes and Gary Frank star(n).

Drama based on a true story, starring Christine Lahti, Mary Kay Place, Robert Bockstael, Barry Corbin and Andrew Ducote(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Cousins Ham, Cora and Job come to stay on Walton's Mountain, but they prove to be out-and-out crooks(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After meeting an itinerant singer, a restless Mary Ellen decides to run away from home. However, when he does not take kindly to her following him, she disappears again and is left up to John-Boy to find her. Meanwhile, the rest of the family works hard picking apples to save enough money to send her on a trip to Washington to cure her wanderlust(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and her friend Andy find a mother dog in a trap and two puppies nearby. They take the `dogs' home, only to find out they are wolves(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A spate of burglaries in Walnut Grove prompts Laura and Andy to become amateur detectives. The duo set out to catch the culprit in the act, but their efforts only end up making matters worse after Charles is caught in one of their traps(n).(n)

programme.title: One Woman's Courage
programme.desc: A woman is driven to drink by her husband's infidelity, and witnesses an assault. Drama, starring Patty Duke, Margot Kidder and James Farentino(n).(n)

An encounter with a homeless pianist reminds him of his forgotten dream of becoming a musician, so he decides to help the residents of a homeless shelter earn some money by forming a choir. Drama, starring Jason Gedrick and Tyrone Benskin(n).(n)

programme.title: Before He Wakes
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller about a greedy woman who marries and murders two wealthy husbands in succession, to acquire their fortunes, and almost succeeds in getting away scot-free. Starring Jaclyn Smith, Diana Scarwid, Hope Lange and Timothy Carhart(n).(n)

programme.title: Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: A shy college boy goes to work as a swimming instructor at an exclusive country club during the summer holidays - only to become besotted with the wealthy mother of one of his pupils. Drama, starring Susan Lucci and Patrick Von Horn(n).(n)

programme.title: Her Desperate Choice
programme.desc: A woman flees the authorities in an attempt to protect her daughter from the child's paedophile father and seeks the help of an underground organisation dedicated to protecting abused youngsters. Drama, with Kyle Secor, Faith Ford, Hanna R Hall and Nigel Bennett(n).(n)

programme.title: A Change of Heart
programme.desc: A widower's efforts to adopt a baby girl are hampered by unfeeling authorities reluctant to let him take care of a child on his own. Drama, starring Andrew McCarthy, Teri Polo, Michael Learned and Shirley Knight(n).(n)

programme.title: One Against the Wind

programme.title: Taming Andrew
programme.desc: A mother is distraught when her son is abducted and spends the next five years searching for him, only to suffer more pain when they are finally reunited and she discovers the emotional trauma he has endured. Fact-based drama, starring Park Overall, Jason Beghe and Seth Adkins(n).(n)

programme.title: Bloody Sunday

Directed by Paul Greengrass and starring James Nesbitt, Nicholas Farrell, Tim Pigott-Smith and Kathy Keira Clarke(n).(n)

programme.title: Spinning Boris

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help out at a home for former patients in a mental hospital who have been released before their treatment was complete(n).

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Vietnam veteran Joe Mason tries to get government assistance with expensive dental work. However, because his condition is not related to his military service, he is denied, leaving him struggling to raise the money(n).

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is falsely convicted of murder and given a life sentence of hard labour(n).

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A preacher's plan to build a church for Native Americans proves controversial, and Festus is caught up in the ensuing conflict(n).

programme.title: Love Is Strange
programme.desc: A woman discovers she has terminal cancer, and spends her final days attempting to patch things up with her sons and ex-husband, who she cast aside during her ruthless pursuit of a career. Drama, starring Kate Nelligan, Ron Silver, Julie Harris and Kevin Patrick Walls(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A charismatic newcomer challenges the sheriff in an election, while Grandpa tries to have a captured wild horse set free(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma is outraged at having to share the job of playing the church organ, so threatens to change her religion, and Olivia decides she needs a new look(n).

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso(n).

programme.title: Jack Reed: One of Our Own
programme.desc: The maverick detective's partner is murdered by a hitman they were investigating and he sets out to bring him to justice with the help of the killer's girlfriend. Thriller, directed by and starring Brian Dennehy. With Susan Ruttan, Charles Dutton and CCH Pounder(n).

programme.title: In the Line of Duty: The Price of Vengeance
programme.desc: A tough-talking hitman sets out to bump off a quartet of local businessman who stand in his way - but he decides to do away with a hard-nosed cop into the bargain, a decision that makes him the target of a furious vendetta. Crime thriller, starring Dean Stockwell, Michael Gross and Brent Jennings(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. John searches for a missing soldier, Jim Bob is attacked by a grieving father, and the family receives distressing news from the front line(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The arrival of Christmas prompts everyone to become secretive. Laura wants to buy something expensive for her mother and has to come up with a way to pay for it(n).

programme.title: Judgment Day: The John List Story

Fact-based drama, starring Robert Blake, Beverly D'Angelo, David Caruso and Melinda Dillon(n).

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross

Drama based on David Mamet's stage play, starring Jack Lemmon, Al Pacino, Kevin Spacey and Alec Baldwin(n).

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Ronald James, a respected reporter and anti-drug advocate, is shocked to come home and find out that his son has turned him into the police for cocaine addiction(n).(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark come to the aid of an old friend who cannot afford to support himself and care for his comatose son. Eli Wallach guest stars(n).(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A man tries to raise money for his own ranch by breaking in wild horses, but his dreams are ruined when he gets kicked in the head by an animal. Gary Busey guest stars(n).(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A boy is shunned by his peers for refusing to take on his father in a fist fight as part of a traditional ritual of manhood. Guest starring Robert Urich (Spenser for Hire)(n).(n)

programme.title: Web of Deceit
programme.desc: A couple are torn apart by the sudden disappearance of their newborn son - a mystery which leads to murder accusations when a bloodstained baby's blanket is found in the back of the wife's car. Thriller, starring real-life husband and wife Corbin Bernsen and Amanda Pays alongside Neve Campbell(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth has disturbing dreams and begins sleepwalking. John-Boy realises there is a connection between her nightmares and a childhood experience that she cannot remember(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin's first love returns to town and intends to marry her, but her parents think she is too young and want her to finish school first(n).(n)

programme.title: In Defense of Kids
programme.desc: An encounter with a young runaway leads a lawyer to devote her career to representing abused and neglected youngsters. Drama, starring Blythe Danner and Sam Waterston(n).(n)

programme.title: Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: A mix-up in a maternity ward results in two new mothers unwittingly taking home the wrong babies - leaving them to face a terrible dilemma once the truth comes to light. Drama based on a true story, starring Melissa Gilbert, Rosanna Arquette, David Andrews and James McCaffrey(n).(n)

programme.title: Deep in My Heart
programme.desc: A white woman gives birth to a black baby following a sexual assault and resolves to give it away to foster care. However, after initially being placed in a loving home, the child is sent to live with a well-meaning but unsuitable family. Fact-based drama, starring Anne Bancroft, Lynn Whitfield, Alice Krige and Cara Buono(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. John searches for a missing soldier, Jim Bob is attacked by a grieving father, and the family receives distressing news from the front line(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nels Oleson storms out after an argument with Harriet. Their neighbours fear they will divorce, and try to get them to reconcile(n).(n)

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia(n).(n)

programme.title: A War of Children
programme.desc: A Catholic girl angers her friends and family by falling for a British soldier in the tense atmosphere of 1970s Belfast. Romantic drama, starring Jenny Agutter, John Ronane, Anthony Andrews and Danny Figgis(n).(n)

programme.title: Don't Die My Love
programme.desc: A high-school student bravely stands by her football star boyfriend as he undergoes painful treatment for cancer, but her mother's disapproval threatens to end their relationship. Drama, starring Beth Broderick, Scott Vickaryous, Katie Herrod and Malcolm Stewart(n).(n)

programme.title: Deacons for Defence
programme.desc: A black man is pushed too far by the racist abuse and unprovoked violent assaults meted out by white bigots in the 1960s, and organises a defence group to fight back. Fact-based drama, starring Forest Whitaker, Adam Weiner, Jonathan Silverman and Serene Lee(n).(n)

programme.title: Norman Saves the World
programme.desc: Searching for a way to get Mickey out of prison, Ray turns to an old opponent to secure a bartering chip in the form of a less-than-wholesome family comedy star. Meanwhile, without the protection of the Russians, Ray must help Mickey secure his own safety and gain admittance to the secure K6G prison wing(n).

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: After a public declaration from Marisol, Hector's rematch with Whittaker is cancelled. However, Ray enlists the help of Lena and Daryll to ensure the match proceeds. Meanwhile, an angry neighbor confronts the Donovans about Conor's reckless behavior. And Teresa's worsening depression causes her family to have her committed to a mental hospital(n).

programme.title: Goodbye Beautiful
programme.desc: When the head of the Russian mob arrives to find out what really happened to Belikov, Sonia and her daughter take refuge at the Donovan's, throwing her and Abby into close quarters. As both Avi and Lena question Ray's loyalty to Sonia, he must decide whether to help her or put the lives of his family and friends in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Mickey returns to Primm - in search of stolen money, Sylvie and vengeance(n).

programme.title: Lake Hollywood
programme.desc: Confronted with a crisis involving one of their own, Ray and his team strategize on how to use art from the Kovitzsky gallery as leverage. Meanwhile, after Hector's wife informs him that she and their daughter are moving to escape the incest scandal, he reaches a breaking point and enlists Ray's help in fixing the situation(n).

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n).

programme.title: The Load Out
programme.desc: A memorial for a rock and roll legend at the LA Forum brings together a star-studded lineup, while the crew faces an uncertain future. Season finale(n).

programme.title: Godfrey: Regular Black
programme.desc: No-holds barred stand-up comedian Godfrey performs a riotous set in his hometown of Chicago(n).

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: An eccentric casino owner (John Cleese) pits six teams against each other in a dash across the desert to a locker stuffed with $2 million in this madcap comedy. Among the racers: a narcoleptic Italian (Rowan Atkinson), an uptight politician (Breckin Meyer), a daredevil pilot (Amy Smart), a just-reunited mother and daughter (Whoopi Goldberg and Lanei Chapman), a greedy family man (Jon Lovitz), dimwitted brothers (Seth Green and Vince Vieluf), and a disgraced NFL ref (Cuba Gooding Jr.)(n).

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars in this ethereal drama based on the best-selling novel about a family of repressed teenaged girls in the 1970s who take drastic action to escape their restrictive home life. Danny DeVito, Josh Hartnett, Kathleen Turner and James Woods costar in the directorial debut of Sofia Coppola(n).

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family(n).

programme.title: Along Came A Spider
programme.desc: When brilliant psychopath Gary Soneji (Michael Wincott) kidnaps the daughter of a U.S. senator, it's up to forensic psychologist Alex Cross (Morgan Freeman) and FBI agent Jezzie Flannigan (Monica Potter) to find the ruthless criminal. It soon becomes clear that the kidnapping's a ruse, that Soneji has something far more sinister up his sleeve, and that he's getting help from within the government. Michael Moriarty, Penelope Ann Miller and Dylan Baker costar in this thrilling sequel to "Kiss the Girls."(n).

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n).

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Jackson as John Shaft, a New York cop seeking a murder witness (Toni Collette) who can finger a spoiled construction business heir (Christian Bale) for the racially motivated murder of a black student. In the meantime, the wealthy killer has enlisted the aid of a drug dealer (Jeffrey Wright) who wants to move into big league narcotics trafficking. Vanessa L. Williams and Busta Rhymes costar(n).

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars in this tale based on the true story of Alan Turing, a genius British mathematician, who works against the clock to crack Germany's infamously unbreakable codes during World War II and defies convention in his personal life. Also stars Keira Knightley(n).

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Christian Bale star in this blazing Western remake as, respectively, a daring outlaw and the humble farmer deputized to deliver him to justice. Peter Fonda, Gretchen Mol, Ben Foster and Alan Tudyk costar in this acclaimed frontier adventure(n).

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: This rawboned action conspiracy thriller stars Mark Wahlberg as a former Marine Corps sniper Bob Lee Swagger, who answers his country's call when a retired colonel (Danny Glover) enlists him to stop a presidential assassin. The twist is that Bob Lee finds himself tagged as the patsy in a murderous conspiracy, with only an FBI rookie (Michael Pena) on his side(n).(n)

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott(n).(n)

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: Bruce Willis stars as a hard-bitten Navy S.E.A.L, who is sent into the heart of Africa and finds himself in conflict when he has to choose between following orders or the dictates of his conscience(n).(n)

programme.title: Sling Blade
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton became a star when he wrote, directed and starred in this acclaimed drama as Karl Childers, a mildly retarded prisoner who is released from a mental institution after spending most of his life there following his murder of his abusive mother and her lover. Karl starts life over in a small Southern town, where he befriends a sensitive boy and his mother, but the mother's violent boyfriend stirs up old impulses in Karl that could lead to tragedy. Lucas Black, John Ritter, Dwight Yoakam and Robert Duvall costar(n).(n)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter(n).(n)

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt(n).(n)

programme.title: Springsteen & I
programme.desc: A unique music documentary celebrating 40 years of rock 'n' roll icon Bruce Springsteen. Working with the filmmakers, his fans have submitted clips to create a film that reflects on their personal insights and experiences, exploring what this timeless artist means to them. Combined with the never-before-seen archival footage of Bruce's performances throughout his career, and his incredible music, this is a film for the people, by the people(n).(n)

programme.title: Listen To Me Marlon
programme.desc: Documentary that reveals Hollywood legend Marlon Brando entirely in his own words -- through exclusive access to the actor's extraordinary personal archive of unseen film footage and unheard audio recordings, comprising the definitive story of one of the most complex and influential actors of all time(n).(n)

programme.desc: Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio star as a married couple trying to escape the suburban inertia of 1950s Connecticut but when they put an audacious plan in motion to move to Paris, their relationship is pushed to the brink(n).(n)

Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller(n).

programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy(n).

programme.title: Ticks (1992)
programme.desc: A group of troubled teenagers led by social workers on a California wilderness retreat discover that the woods they are camping in have become infested by mutated, blood-sucking ticks. Stars Seth Green(n).(n)

programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth(n).(n)

programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl(n).(n)

programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries are chosen to carry out a covert operation deep in a former Soviet State that sends them into a maze of tunnels inhabited by menacing creatures and towards an underground laboratory where they must secure specimens of genetically engineered human and alien hybrids(n).(n)

programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n).

programme.desc: When a pair of ex-cons kidnaps a wealthy young woman, they don't anticipate that their victim will be smarter than they are and begin playing them against each other. Eddie Marsan, Martin Compston and Gemma Arterton star in this British crime thriller(n).

programme.desc: A group of young friends make an incomprehensible discovery in an abandoned mine - but the more they try to change the future, the more they seal their fate. Starring Briana Evigan, Julianna Guill and Ethan Peck(n).

programme.desc: In this Australian horror flick a young nurse begins work at an isolated psychiatric ward, and quickly becomes fascinated with a brain dead patient who is the subject of a mad scientist's cruel and unusual experiments. What starts as an innocent fascination quickly takes a sinister turn, as the patient begins to use his psychic powers to manipulate her every move(n).

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n).

programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection(n).

programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy(n).

But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach(n).(n)

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A seemingly ideal day turns disastrous when California's notorious San Andreas fault triggers a devastating, magnitude 9 earthquake, the largest in recorded history. As the Earth cracks open and buildings start to crumble, Ray Gaines, an LAFD search-and-rescue helicopter pilot, must navigate the destruction from Los Angeles to San Francisco to bring his estranged wife and their only daughter to safety(n).(n)

programme.title: Real Women Have Curves
programme.desc: Curves on a blossoming young woman can be sexy, but not if you are told you have too many of them. ``Real Women Have Curves'' is a humorous and warmhearted look at a Mexican-American teenage girl coming of age in a boiling cauldron of cultural expectations, class constrictions, family duty, and her own personal aspirations(n).(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward high-school senior and a gravely ill classmate surprise themselves by becoming inseparable friends(n).(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Historian and code-breaker Ben Gates has been searching his whole life for a rumored treasure dating back to the creation of the United States. Joining an expedition led by fellow treasure hunter Ian Howe, Gates finds an ice-locked Colonial ship in the Arctic Circle that contains a clue linking the treasure to the Declaration of Independence. But when Howe betrays him, Gates has to race to get to the document ahead of his so-called colleague(n).(n)

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A seemingly ideal day turns disastrous when California's notorious San Andreas fault triggers a devastating, magnitude 9 earthquake, the largest in recorded history. As the Earth cracks open and buildings start to crumble, Ray Gaines, an LAFD search-and-rescue helicopter pilot, must navigate the destruction from Los Angeles to San Francisco to bring his estranged wife and their only daughter to safety(n).(n)

programme.title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp With the Los Angeles Rams
Spy
programme.desc: Despite having solid field training, CIA analyst Susan Cooper has spent her entire career as a desk jockey, working hand-in-hand with dashing agent Bradley Fine . Using high-tech equipment and a hidden earpiece, Susan is the guardian angel who helps Bradley avoid danger. However, when Bradley is assassinated by Bulgarian arms dealer Rayna Boyanov, Susan wrangles her way into her first undercover assignment to help capture Boyanov and avenge Bradley(n).(n)

programme.title: Slither
programme.desc: Wheelsy is a small town where not much happens and everyone minds his own business. No one notices when evil slips in quietly but, when people find mutilated livestock and a woman goes missing, Sheriff Bill Pardy discovers an alien organism that threatens to devour all life on Earth(n).

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Two cops in 1940s Los Angeles investigate the murder of a Hollywood starlet, and one puts his marriage in jeopardy by obsessing over the crime, while the other becomes involved with a woman from a prominent family, who happens to have an unsavory tie to the victim(n).

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: Examining the science of happiness; former professional football players Brett Favre, Tiki Barber and Wayne Chrebet search for happiness; Peter Berg hosts a roundtable discussion(n).

programme.title: Hitchcock/Truffaut
programme.desc: Filmmakers Martin Scorsese, David Fincher, Wes Anderson and others discuss the legacy of Alfred Hitchcock and the book ``Hitchcock'' by François Truffaut(n).

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Ex-Special Forces operator Frank Martin lives what seems to be a quiet life along the French Mediterranean, hiring himself out as a mercenary transporter who moves goods - human or otherwise - from one place to another. No questions asked. Dangerous complications ensue when he is hired to kidnap the feisty daughter of a lethal Chinese crime lord who's smuggling his fellow countrymen into France(n).

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In 1820, crewmen aboard the New England vessel Essex face a harrowing battle for survival when a whale of mammoth size and strength attacks with force, crippling their ship and leaving them adrift in the ocean. Pushed to their limits and facing storms, starvation, panic and despair, the survivors must resort to the unthinkable to stay alive. Their incredible tale ultimately inspires author Herman Melville to write ``Moby-Dick.''(n).

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: A Pakistani-American student's night takes a turn for the worse when he is arrested for murder(n).

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: While attorney John Stone counsels Naz, lead detective Dennis Box investigates the crime(n).

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: As he awaits his formal arraignment at Rikers Island, Naz realizes that his survival, or perhaps his demise, rests in the hands of a particular inmate(n).

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: Attorney John Stone works to uncover information about the crime(n).

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.sub-title: Part 5: The Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Box reconstructs Naz's whereabouts on the night of the murder(n).

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: Prosecutor Helen Weiss prepares for the upcoming trial; Naz's alliance with Freddy continues to grow(n).

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: Naz's trial moves to the defense phase(n).

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.sub-title: Part 8: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Stone is thrust into the spotlight as a controversy involving the defense emerges(n).

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: It's been three years since Mike Lane's retirement from stripping, but the former dancer misses the excitement and feeling of being on stage. Most of all, though, he misses the best friends that he ever had, the crew known as the Kings of Tampa. Opportunity comes knocking when the guys look him up as they travel to Myrtle Beach, S.C., for a stripper convention. With the promise of outrageous fun, a reinvigorated Mike can't resist the chance to join in and take it off again(n).

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: Thrill-seeking criminals perform a series of daredevil stunts to steal money and gems, only to give it away to the poor and less fortunate. Training for a job with the FBI, young recruit Johnny Utah suspects that only extreme athletes could pull off these heists. Utilizing his own special skills, Utah infiltrates the gang of thieves after befriending their charismatic leader, Bodhi. As Johnny experiences the rush of their lifestyle, his superiors fear that his loyalties are being tested(n).

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: On the morning of May 10, 1996, climbers from two expeditions start their final ascent toward the summit of Mount Everest, the highest point on Earth. With little warning, a violent storm strikes the mountain, engulfing the adventurers in one of the fiercest blizzards ever encountered by man. Challenged by the harshest conditions imaginable, the teams must endure blistering winds and freezing temperatures in an epic battle to survive against nearly impossible odds(n).(n)

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In a California beach community, private detective Larry ``Doc'' Sportello tends to work his cases through a smoky haze of marijuana. One day, Shasta, a former lover, arrives out of the blue to plead for Doc's help; it seems that Shasta's current beau, rich real-estate tycoon Mickey Wolfmann, has a wife who may be plotting to commit him to a mental hospital. When Mickey and Shasta both disappear, Doc navigates a psychedelic world of surfers, stoners and cops to solve the case(n).(n)

programme.title: Double Take
programme.desc: A successful New York investment banker Daryl Chase is suddenly on the run and has to switch identities with low-life petty thief Freddy Tiffany . Until now, Daryl's led a charmed life. However, everything is turned upside down when he is framed for laundering millions for a Mexican drug cartel. He makes a run to the border in an attempt to clear his name(n).(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Disaster strikes on Aug. 5, 2010, as a copper and gold mine collapses in Chile, trapping 33 men underground. With more than 2,000 feet of rock in their way, members of a rescue team work tirelessly for 69 days to save the seemingly doomed crew. Beneath the rubble, the miners begin an epic quest to survive, contending with suffocating heat and the need for food and water. With family, friends and the rest of the world watching, it becomes a race against time and a true test of the human spirit(n).(n)

programme.title: It's Me, Hilary: The Man Who Drew Eloise
programme.desc: Writer and artist Hilary Knight discusses his life and career, including his illustrations for the ``Eloise'' series of books(n).(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Music manager Dave is not only enjoying a burgeoning career, but a blossoming romance with Samantha, a beautiful doctor who works in the emergency room. Through a series of misunderstandings, the chipmunks start to believe that a marriage proposal is on the horizon. Dreading the thought of an antagonistic stepbrother, Alvin, Theodore and Simon embark on a cross-country odyssey to prevent their best pal from ruining their lives(n).(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: After defeating international terrorist Owen Shaw, Dominic Toretto, Brian O'Conner and the rest of the crew have separated to return to more normal lives. However, Deckard Shaw, Owen's older brother, is thirsty for revenge. A slick government agent offers to help Dom and company take care of Shaw in exchange for their help in rescuing a kidnapped computer hacker who has developed a powerful surveillance program(n).(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: In the 1980s U.S.Rep. Charlie Wilson, Texas socialite Joanne Herring and CIA agent Gust Avrakotos form an unlikely alliance to boost funding for Afghan freedom fighters in their war against invading Soviets. The trio's successful efforts to finance these covert operations contributes to the fall of the Soviet Union and the end of the Cold War(n).(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Cop Harry Callahan attempts to track down a psychopathic rooftop killer before a kidnapped girl dies. When he is found Harry abuses the murderer's civil rights putting him back on the streets. Once he is released he hijacks a school bus and Harry must go after him again. The only way to stop this vicious killer is in cold blood(n).(n)

programme.title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp With the Los Angeles Rams
The Invasion
programme.desc: Washington, D.C. psychologist Carol Bennell and her colleague Dr. Ben Driscoll are the only two people on Earth who are aware of an epidemic running rampant through the city. They discover an alien virus aboard a crashed space shuttle that transforms anyone who comes into contact with it into unfeeling drones while they sleep. Carol realizes her son holds the key to stopping the spread of the plague and she races to find him before it is too late(n).(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Music manager Dave is not only enjoying a burgeoning career, but a blossoming romance with Samantha, a beautiful doctor who works in the emergency room. programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: A human drama inspired by events in the life of John Forbes Nash Jr., and in part based on the biography ``A Beautiful Mind'' by Sylvia Nasar. From the heights of notoriety to the depths of depravity, John Forbes Nash Jr. experienced it all. A mathematical genius, he made an astonishing discovery early in his career and stood on the brink of international acclaim. But the handsome and arrogant Nash soon found himself on a painful and harrowing journey of self-discovery(n).(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: By day, Mike makes ends meet any way he can -- handyman jobs, detailing cars or designing furniture. But nighttime is when Mike really gets to display his many talents: He's the hot headliner in an all-male revue. Mike sees potential in a 19-year-old he dubs the Kid, takes the teen under his wing and instructs him in the tricks of the trade. However, Mike learns there's a downside to the stripper lifestyle when it threatens his romance with the Kid's sister(n).

programme.title: Robert Klein: The Amorous Busboy of Decatur Avenue
Casper
programme.desc: Casper (voiced by Malachi Pearson) is a kind young ghost who peacefully haunts a mansion in Maine. When specialist James Harvey arrives to communicate with Casper and his fellow spirits, he brings along his teenage daughter, Kat . Casper quickly falls in love with Kat, but their budding relationship is complicated not only by his transparent state, but also by his troublemaking apparition uncles and their mischievous antics(n).

programme.title: The Making Of: The Peanuts Movie
Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: When the exhibits at New York's Natural History Museum start behaving strangely, Larry Daley -- now the director of nighttime operations -- must find out the cause. He learns that the Tablet, which magically brings Teddy Roosevelt, Jedediah and the other exhibits to life at night, has started to decay. Larry, along with his son and museum friends, must travel to London's British Museum to learn how to prevent the Tablet's magic from disappearing(n).

programme.title: Wagons East!
programme.desc: Exasperated pioneers hire the ill-fated Donner Party's former trail guide to escort them back to their original homes(n).

programme.title: Shrink
programme.desc: Henry Carter, a jaded therapist-to-the-stars, uses marijuana to forget his troubles. His first pro bono case puts him in touch with Jemma, a troubled teen who lives far from the glamour of the Hollywood Hills. Confronted with her real problems, Henry wonders, given his current state of mind, if he can help Jemma find answers to her questions(n).

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean and his gang hatch an ambitious plot for revenge after ruthless casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses Reuben Tishkoff, Danny's friend and mentor. First, Ocean's gang plan to hit Bank in the paycheck by reversing the precept that the house always wins. Next, they will deal a crushing blow to Bank's ego by ruining his reputation as the only hotelier to earn the Royal Review's Five Diamond Award for each of his properties(n).

programme.title: Riding in Cars With Boys
programme.desc: The fresh, funny, touching and true story of writer Beverly Donofrio (played by Drew Barrymore, who ages from 15 to 35 in the role), reveals her coming of age in the late 1960s and her whole life colored by an event that happened when she was 15. The events span more than two decades, as the young heroine experiences often-humorous, sometimes-irreverent, but certainly a unique personal journey to make something meaningful of her life(n).

programme.title: State and Main
programme.desc: A big-budget movie crew descends upon a quaint New England village, sowing a bumper crop of corruption, vanity and greed in David Marnet's ``State and Main''; in the days that elapse before the cameras finally roll, money will change hands, careers will be jeopardized and love will blossom in the small-town soil(n).

programme.title: Shrink
programme.desc: Henry Carter, a jaded therapist-to-the-stars, uses marijuana to forget his troubles. His first pro bono case puts him in touch with Jemma, a troubled teen who lives far from the glamour of the Hollywood Hills. Confronted with her real problems, Henry wonders, given his current state of mind, if he can help Jemma find answers to her questions(n).

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: This zany spoof of gangster movies charts the rise and pratfalls of the Cortino crime family. After growing up poor in Salmonella, Sicily, Vincenzo Cortino installs himself as the preeminent, if bumbling, Mafia don of the New World. But now he must pass on power to one of his two sons: either level-headed veteran Anthony or vituperative loose cannon Joey . The resulting power struggle leads to betrayal, murder and Scorsese references galore(n).

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: When Xerxes, the evil god king of Persia, sends his massive army to Sparta, King Leonidas and 13 strapping warriors rise up to defend their homeland. Leonidas, Captain and the rest face down dancing Persians, bad punch-lines and celebrity look-alikes(n).

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen

programme.desc: Life has changed drastically for thunder buddies John, now a bachelor, and best pal Ted, now married to the woman of his dreams. Problems arise when the couple decide to adopt a child, but the law declares Ted to be property and not a person. Angry and dejected, the lovably foulmouthed teddy bear must now seek legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney to get the justice he deserves(n).(n)

programme.title: Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Comic D.L. Hughley, who has appeared on ``Def Comedy Jam'' and ``One-Night Stand.''(n).(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: The Brothers Grimm, Wilhelm and Jacob, are dysfunctional schemers who go from town to town putting on shows that convince inhabitants they are getting rid of demons. After one such scam, a mysterious man called Cavaldi brings them to a French general, who persuades them to battle the evil that has kidnapped 10 girls from a small village. During the investigation, the cynical Wilhelm and sensitive Jacob see things that point to real magic at work(n).(n)

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: When President Ulysses S. Grant learns that diabolical inventor Dr. Arliss Loveless is planning to assassinate him, he orders Civil War hero James West and U.S. Marshal Artemus Gordon (also Kline) to arrest him. West's trigger-happy personality doesn't always mesh well with that of the thoughtful Gordon, but they manage to work together. And with the help of a mysterious stranger, West and Gordon close in on Loveless(n).(n)

programme.title: Bait Shop
programme.desc: The owner of a small-town bait shop competes in a fishing tournament for the prize money to save his business(n).(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Remembering fond, childhood memories of his trip to Walley World, Rusty Griswold surprises his wife and two sons with a cross-country excursion to America's favorite fun park. Following in his father's footsteps, Rusty and the gang pack up the car and hit the road for some much-needed family bonding. Soon, the promise of fun turns into one misadventure after another for the next generation of Griswolds and anyone who encounters them(n).(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Master chef Kate Armstrong runs her life and her kitchen with intimidating intensity. However, a recipe for disaster may be in the works when she becomes the guardian of her young niece while crossing forks with the brash sous-chef who just joined her staff. Though romance blooms in the face of rivalry, Kate needs to look outside the kitchen to find true happiness(n).(n)

programme.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
programme.desc: Nick Halloway is an average businessman who undergoes an extraordinary change when an experiment gone awry turns him invisible. Government operative David Jenkins discovers Nick in his see-through condition at the scene of the accident and arranges for him to be taken into custody, but he escapes. As Nick tries to find out more about his strange situation, he receives aid from Alice Monroe, a pretty acquaintance who helps him avoid capture(n).(n)

programme.title: McHale's Navy
programme.desc: Shopkeeper McHale is called back to captain the PT-73 and save a Caribbean island from annihilation(n).(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: Rob Gordon is the owner of a failing record store in Chicago, where he sells music the old-fashioned way -- on vinyl. Although they have an encyclopedic knowledge of pop music and are consumed by the music scene, it's of no help to Rob, whose needle skips the love groove when his long-time girlfriend, Laura, walks out on him. As he examines his failed attempts at romance and happiness, the process finds him being dragged, kicking and screaming, into adulthood(n).(n)

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: After a year apart - attending different schools, meeting different people - the guys rent a beach house and vow to make this the best summer ever. As it turns out, whether that will happen or not has a lot to do with the girls. Between the wild parties, outrageous revelations and yes, a trip to band camp, they discover that times change and people change, but in the end, it's all about sticking together(n).(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Frustrated at his own failures and disillusioned with professional sports, tennis player Peter Colt resolves to retire from competition and become an instructor at an exclusive private club. But when Colt receives a surprise wild-card berth in Wimbledon, he can't help but enter the tournament. Soon, Colt meets Lizzie Bradbury, a beautiful American tennis player with an upcoming match of her own, and finds the inspiration he hopes will turn his luck around(n).(n)

programme.desc: Snuffy has to figure out how to remember everyone's order when he helps out at Hooper's Store(n).

programme.desc: Elmo goes to Chicken School for the day(n).

programme.desc: A stranger uses his saxophone to rid a village of rats. Featuring the voices of Samuel L. Jackson, Wesley Snipes and Grant Shaud(n).

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: A soldier follows the trail of 12 dancing princesses. Featuring the voices of Jon Secada, Hector Elizondo and Daisy Fuentes(n).

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: Casey Carlyle is supposed to go to Harvard, just like her mother . While Casey has the grades to get into her mom's alma mater, what she really wants to do is pursue her passion: figure skating. Both Casey's mom and Gen, the captain of the local team, scoff at the idea of Casey on the ice. But Casey soon finds an unlikely ally, and coach, in Gen's mom, Tina, a former skater trying to live down mistakes from her past(n).

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: In the second live-action Muppets film, intrepid journalists Kermit, Fozzie and Gonzo snag an assignment reporting on a British jewel heist. Arriving in England, the trio settles in at the raucous Happiness Hotel and seeks out socialite Lady Holiday, the victim of the theft. Soon Miss Piggy appears, intending to work for Lady Holiday, but she ends up being framed by the aristocrat's scheming brother, Nicky. Kermit and company work to clear Piggy's name(n).

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: When his family moves from the U.S. to England, young Will Stanton feels like a fish out of water. But, he becomes an unlikely hero when he discovers he is the last in a line of warriors known as the Old Ones. The Old Ones protect the world from the forces of the dark. Will must assume the role of The Seeker, using special powers to find the signs hidden throughout the ages and restore the balance between Light and Dark(n).

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: Francine tries to solve a mystery and win the title of Master Detective(n).

programme.desc: Posing as children's photographers, three crooks scheme their way into a mansion to kidnap an infant . Their hostage proves quite resourceful, however, escaping their hideout and making his way into downtown Chicago. Now the con men have to find their abductee, who believes that in order to return home he must reenact scenes from his favorite storybook, including trips to the zoo and a construction site(n).
